medical_history.chief_complaint: Right shoulder pain and generalized shoulder discomfort.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms began two years prior to presentation, intensifying with activity and causing pain when lying on the shoulder at night. No trauma or systemic symptoms were reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, hypercholesterolemia, and a brain injury with severe crush injuries from a motor-vehicle accident at age four. No past injuries to the right shoulder or upper extremity.
medical_history.family_history: Both his mother and sister had a history of carcinoma of the breast.
